thread.title: Harbhajan Singh invites PM Narendra Modi for his wedding
thread.title_full: Harbhajan Singh invites PM Narendra Modi for his wedding - Sports

author: PTI
title: Harbhajan Singh invites PM Narendra Modi for his wedding
text:
New Delhi: Indian off-spinner Harbhajan Singh met Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday and invited him for his marriage, scheduled later this month.


Prime Minister Narendra Modi with Harbhajan Singh in New Delhi. Pic/PTI 
A photo of an excited Harbhajan shaking hands with the head of the state was posted on the PMO handle with a caption 'Cricketer Harbhajan Singh met PM'.
Harbhajan, who was part of the Indian T20 squad that lost to South Africa, is tying the nuptial knot with actor-girlfriend Geeta Basra.
